nodes.text: A type of two-pronged blaster rifle was utilized by the Sovereign Protectors of the Sith Eternal in protection of their leader, Emperor of the Final Order, Darth Sidious. They were ceremonial weapons which mixed a blaster and a blade together. In 35 ABY, they were used against the Jedi Rey when she and the former Kylo Ren, Ben Solo, turned on Sidious. The pair successfully killed all members of the Sovereign Protectors, ending the usage of their rifles.
